index.title: Read at 300-400+ WPM
index.subtitle: Use the scientifically proven RSVP (Rapid Serial Visual Presentation) technique to dramatically improve your reading speed while maintaining comprehension.
index.lightningFastDesc: Eliminate distractions and improve concentration by focusing on one word at a time.

index.tip1Desc: Begin with 200-250 WPM and gradually increase as you get comfortable.
index.tip2Desc: Look at the red highlighted character - this is the optimal reading point.
index.tip3Desc: Try not to "hear" the words in your head - just absorb the meaning.
index.tip4Desc: Consistent practice is key to building and maintaining speed reading skills.
index.tip5Desc: Master the keyboard shortcuts for a seamless reading experience.
index.tip6Desc: Experiment with different WPM speeds and chunk sizes to find your optimal settings.
